hero.subtitle: Gano samfura, ba matsaloli ba. Horar da kwakwalwarka, ba sa'a ba.

feedback.aiIntro: Ga yadda za ka inganta amsarka:
feedback.aisuggestion:
üß† Inganta Two Sum

∆òila maganin yanzu yana bincika kowace ha…ói ‚Äî hakan na O(n¬≤).

Ga yadda zaka inganta:

1. **Yi tunanin ajiye abubuwan da ka riga ka gani** ‚Äî zaka iya tuna matsayinsu?
2. **Ta yaya idan zaka iya duba complement (target - adadin yanzu) nan take?** Wannan zai guje wa zagaye na ciki.
3. **Gwada amfani da hash map** don adana indices. Bincike yana da sauri ‚Äî O(1).
4. Yi looping sau …óaya ta cikin array ka yanke shawara abin da za ka ajiye ko duba a kowane mataki.
5. Kada ka manta da maganin lokuta na musamman, kamar ∆ôimomi masu maimaituwa ko babu ingantaccen jufa.

Za ka iya gina wannan manufa mataki‚Äëmataki?

preview.practiceDescription: Yi aiki kan matsaloli daga manyan kamfanonin fasaha tare da hanyoyin koyo da tsararrun tambayoyin kamfani
preview.signInMessage: Da fatan za a shiga don samun damar yin amfani da matsalolin farko na tambayoyin coding.

header.title: Tafiyar Coding
header.subtitle: Daga matsala zuwa mafita, tare da jagorar AI a kowane mataki

section1.title: Fara Tafiyar Coding Dinka
section1.description: Fara da fahimtar matsalar. Karanta a hankali, bincika bukatun, kuma tsara tsarin ku. Kowane babban mafita yana farawa da fahimta bayyananne.

section2.title: Rubuta Lambar Ku
section2.description: Canza ra'ayoyin ku zuwa lamba. Yi amfani da edita don aiwatar da mafita ta ku mataki-mataki. Kada ku damu da kamala - mayar da hankali kan samun dabaru daidai da farko.

section3.title: Lokacin da Abubuwa Basu Aiki ba
section3.description: Makale? Gwaje-gwaje sun gaza? Kada ku damu! Wannan wani bangare ne na tsarin koyo. Kowane mai ha…ìakawa yana fuskantar ∆ôalubale - haka muke girma da ha…ìaka ∆ôwarewarmu.

section4.title: Taimakon AI
section4.description: Samu taimako na musamman lokacin da kuke bu∆ôata. AI …óinmu yana nazarin lambar ku, yana fahimtar kurakuran ku, kuma yana ba da shawarwari masu dacewa don jagorancin ku.

journey.dontWorry: Kada ku damu! Wannan wani bangare ne na koyo.

ai.title: Mataimakin AI
ai.suggestion1: üí° Na lura ba ku da maganar dawowa a cikin aikin ku.
ai.suggestion2: üîç Gwada ∆ôara sarrafa kurakurai don matsanancin yanayi.
ai.suggestion3: ‚ö° Yi la'akari da amfani da taswirar hash don lokaci O(n).

header.subtitle: Dandalin mu na hankali ya ha…óu da AI na ci gaba da ingantattun hanyoyin koyarwa don ba da ∆ôwarewar koyo wanda ya dace da saurin ku da manufofin ku na musamman.

step1.title: Gano Tsarin AI
step1.description: Ha…ìa…ì…ìun algorithms suna nazarin tsarin coding …óin ku kuma suna gano gibin ilimi daidai, suna ∆ôir∆ôirar taswirar koyo ta musamman wacce ta dace da ∆ôwarewar ku da wuraren ha…ìakawa.

step2.title: Injin Koyo Mai Daidaitawa
step2.description: Tsarin mu na hankali yana ci gaba da daidaitawa da ci gaban ku, yana ba da saitin matsaloli na musamman wa…óanda suka dace da matakin ∆ôwarewar ku da bu∆ôatun kamfani, yana tabbatar da ingantaccen ingancin koyo.

step3.title: Kwaikwayon Tambayoyin Aiki Na Ainihi
step3.description: Ku fuskanci yanayin tambayoyin gaskiya daga manyan kamfanonin fasaha tare da ra'ayi na ainihi, nazarin aiki, da cikakken shiri don tambayoyin fasaha.

testimonials.trusted: Amince da Masu Ha…ìakawa a Duniya
testimonials.title: Gina Makomar Ilimin Fasaha
testimonials.subtitle: Ha…óa da …óaruruwan masu ha…ìakawa wa…óanda ke ha…ìaka koyo tare da dandalin mu. Muna tsara ∆ôarni na gaba na ilimin fasaha - ku kasance cikin tafiya.

items.quote: Yana jin kamar samun babban mai ha…ìakawa yana jagoranta 24/7.
items.text: Ina warware matsaloli masu sarkakiya cikin rabin lokaci. Amfanin da aka ke…ìance ya canza wasa.
